tab.title: BRIDAL HENNA

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Allows time for two wrap-around detailed hand designs from slightly above the wrists down to fingers, palms, and medium coverage feet using Ash Kumar Certified bridal techniques. Designs can be tailored to your specific needs and are customized for each bride.

tab.title: WEDDING PARTY

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Adorn your wedding guests in custom one-of-a-kind freestyle henna designs. Small to medium coverage strip designs. Rate includes 4x2' table with cloth, signage, two chairs, aftercare sheets for each guest.

tab.title: Individual Appointment

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Allows enough time for two medium coverage detailed designs, one extra large design for one person, or split the cost with up to 8 individuals for more simple designs.

tab.title: Belly Henna

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Adorn your baby bump and celebrate new life with your custom belly henna. Great for memorable maternity photoshoots.

tab.title: Henna Crown

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: A henna crown is an awesome empowering transition for all the chemo warriors out there. Special 50% off discounted rate, travel included.

tab.title: Henna Party

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Have a private party or corporate event? Henna makes a great addition and leaves a red/brown stain on the skin. Party designs take about 3-5 minutes each or less to ensure each guest can get at least one simple design.

tab.title: White Henna Glam Party

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: White henna glam lasts 1-3 days and is water resistant. Latex-free, dries in 5 minutes, ready to wear, and great for those who want to try something different.

tab.title: Jagua Party

img.alt: A beautiful henna bride with flowers

tab.content: Jagua stains a navy/black design on the skin and can get washed the same day, as soon as 2-3hrs after application.
